Rating: 3.32
Entertainment
Pakistan expresses inability to convert 'Kapoor Haveli' into museum due to lack of funds

2020-05-02 22:26:00 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.74
Importance: 1.74
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-02 21:36:00

Pakistan expresses inability to convert 'Kapoor Haveli' into museum due to lack of funds

PESHAWAR: Bollywood actor Rishi Kapoor's ancestral home, dubbed as the 'Kapoor Haveli', here cannot be converted into a museum as promised by the Pakistan government due to financial constraints, sources said on Saturday. In 2018, the Pakistan government decided to convert the 'Kapoor Haveli' in Qissa Khwani Bazar in Peshawar in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province into a museum, heeding to a request by Rishi Kapoor who died this week at a hospital in Mumbai. Foreign Minister Shah Mahmood Qureshi had assured Rishi Kapoor that the Pakistan government will convert the actor's house into a museum. The sources in the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa (KPK) Heritage Department told PTI that the department prepared a comprehensive plan under which the haveli's front would be preserved and its inner portion will be repaired and renovated. However, the plan did not go ahead due to lack of financial resources, they said. Federal Minister Shaheryar Afridi had promised to give the status of museum to the 'Kapoor Haveli' soon after the present government of Imran Khan's Pakistan Tehreek-e-insaaf party came into power in July 2018. However, the announcement to this effect could not be materialised despite a lapse of around two years. The haveli is presently the property of a private person who made three/four attempts in the past to demolish the building but could not do it as FIRs were registered against him by the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa heritage department. The owner has now assured the government that he would not dismantle the building. However, due to frequent rains, hailstorms and earthquakes, the condition of the building has deteriorated from inside. The 'Kapoor Haveli' was built by Basheswarnath Kapoor, the father of Bollywood icon Prithviraj Kapoor. The Kapoor family, originally from Peshawar in Pakistan, migrated to India after the partition in 1947. In 1990, Rishi Kapoor along with brother Randhir Kapoor visited their ancestral home where his grandfather, Prithviraj and his father Raj Kapoor, were born. The news of Rishi Kapoor's death sent a wave of sadness and grief among people in Peshawar. A lot of people visited the 'Kapoor Haveli' to express their grief and condolence over his demise. "We had no relation with Rishi Kapoor, but had a liking for him because of watching him as a film hero from childhood and due to his connection with a place which is also a birth place of me," said Pervaiz Ahmad, a city dweller. "Rishi's death has saddened me a lot", Pervaiz added. "Perhaps the feeling expressed by Pervaiz portrays sentiments of all the dwellers of Peshawar over sad demise of Rishi," said Ibrahim Zia, a historian who wrote a book titled 'Peshawar ki Funkar' (Artists of Peshawar).

2020-05-02 22:26:00 • The New Indian Express • https://www.newindianexpress.com/entertainment/hindi/2020/may/02/pakistan-expresses-inability-to-convert-kapoor-haveli-into-museum-due-to-lack-of-funds-2138349.html
Rating: 2.04
Pakistan expresses inability to convert Kapoor Haveli into museum due to lack of funds

Bollywood actor Rishi Kapoor's ancestral home, dubbed as the 'Kapoor Haveli', here cannot be converted into a museum as promised by the Pakistan government due to financial constraints, sources said on Saturday. In 2018, the Pakistan government decided to convert the 'Kapoor Haveli' in Qissa Khwani Bazar in Peshawar in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province into a museum, heeding to a request by Rishi Kapoor who died this week at a hospital in Mumbai. Foreign Minister Shah Mahmood Qureshi had assured Rishi Kapoor that the Pakistan government will convert the actor's house into a museum. The sources in the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa (KPK) Heritage Department told PTI that the department prepared a comprehensive plan under which the haveli's front would be preserved and its inner portion will be repaired and renovated. However, the plan did not go ahead due to lack of financial resources, they said. Federal Minister Shaheryar Afridi had promised to give the status of museum to the 'Kapoor Haveli' soon after the present government of Imran Khan's Pakistan Tehreek-e-insaaf party came into power in July 2018. However, the announcement to this effect could not be materialised despite a lapse of around two years. The haveli is presently the property of a private person who made three/four attempts in the past to demolish the building but could not do it as FIRs were registered against him by the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa heritage department. The owner has now assured the government that he would not dismantle the building. However, due to frequent rains, hailstorms and earthquakes, the condition of the building has deteriorated from inside. The 'Kapoor Haveli' was built by Basheswarnath Kapoor, the father of Bollywood icon Prithviraj Kapoor. The Kapoor family, originally from Peshawar in Pakistan, migrated to India after the partition in 1947. In 1990, Rishi Kapoor along with brother Randhir Kapoor visited their ancestral home where his grandfather, Prithviraj and his father Raj Kapoor, were born. The news of Rishi Kapoor's death sent a wave of sadness and grief among people in Peshawar. A lot of people visited the 'Kapoor Haveli' to express their grief and condolence over his demise. "We had no relation with Rishi Kapoor, but had a liking for him because of watching him as a film hero from childhood and due to his connection with a place which is also a birth place of me,” said Pervaiz Ahmad, a city dweller. "Rishi’s death has saddened me a lot”, Pervaiz added. "Perhaps the feeling expressed by Pervaiz portrays sentiments of all the dwellers of Peshawar over sad demise of Rishi,” said Ibrahim Zia, a historian who wrote a book titled 'Peshawar ki Funkar’ (Artists of Peshawar).

2020-05-02 21:36:00 • Deccan Herald • https://www.deccanherald.com/international/pakistan-expresses-inability-to-convert-kapoor-haveli-into-museum-due-to-lack-of-funds-832726.html
Rating: 2.25
Entertainment
Reporter's Notebook: As coronavirus sparks changes, DC blame game intensifies

2020-05-04 01:06:06 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.66
Importance: 1.66
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-04 01:06:06

Reporter's Notebook: As coronavirus sparks changes, DC blame game intensifies

Get all the latest news on coronavirus and more delivered daily to your inbox.  Sign up here. People have been scrambling to better understand how the coronavirus would affect campaigns in this election year -- but it’s clear the finger-pointing has intensified. Nobody seemed to know how the coronavirus would determine who’d show up to vote, or if voters will cast ballots by mail, a suggestion backed by most Democrats. Nobody seemed to know if red areas turned blue because of the coronavirus, or if previously blue turf turned red. Is the electorate the same? How has it changed? Can people get to the polls? Are voters willing to get to the polls? But, some things don’t change. President Trump’s performance on the ballot this fall certainly will dictate a lot in House and Senate contests -- and neither Democrats nor Republicans have diminished their attacks on the respective House and Senate leaders. Republicans have continued to torch House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, D-Calif., and Democrats have continued to lob grenades at Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell, R-Ky. Both sides have seen opportunity in demonizing those leaders -- as the opposition party in both chambers tried to wrest control from the majority. If nothing else, the attacks have been more vitriolic than before. Besides the president, Pelosi and McConnell have remained the biggest names in politics. Both leaders have been on the air and visible. And, as the rest of the world has cascaded sideways due to the coronavirus, Democrats and Republicans have tried to simplify things for the voters, reverting to tried-and-true methods: McConnell=bad, Pelosi=bad. McConnell is up for re-election this fall. On paper, McConnell’s race isn’t anything close to a competitive seat like the one held by Sen. Martha McSally, R-Ariz. It hasn’t held upset potential like races involving Georgia Republican Sens. David Perdue and Kelly Loeffler. Yet, McConnell’s opponent, Democrat Amy McGrath, outraised the majority leader in the first quarter of this year. Democrats have long portrayed McConnell as a boogeyman, the groundskeeper of the Senate “graveyard” where House bills would go to die. Now, Democrats have been portraying McConnell as bringing the Senate back to session to confirm “conservative judges” – without truly addressing the coronavirus pandemic. Democrats also have been excoriating McConnell for trying to limit coronavirus liability and suggesting that states struggling economically should go bankrupt. “The American people are demanding answers and solutions,” said Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer, D-N.Y. “Senator McConnell ought to focus the Senate’s work on the crises caused by COVID-19, not right-wing judges or fulfilling his ‘pre-existing partisan wish-list’ of protecting big business from any harm done to the American people.” It’s unclear if these refined attacks by Democrats will help McGrath unseat McConnell. Such a scenario has been a stretch from the start. But, McConnell’s presumed dominance in the race may have softened. The coronavirus has shifted the tectonic plates in ways political geologists haven’t yet understood. And, even if McGrath doesn’t come close to defeating McConnell, targeting the majority leader could help the Democrats’ chances in other races and other states. Republicans really don’t have any chances of toppling Pelosi in her San Francisco district. But, that’s not their goal. The key for the GOP would be to reacquaint voters with Pelosi and vilify her for impeachment, keeping the House out of session while she showed off her ice-cream collection and trying to install a system in which lawmakers could vote by proxy during the pandemic. “This is nothing but a Democrat, Pelosi power grab,” blasted Rep. Rodney Davis, R-Ill., the top Republican on the House Administration Committee, when asked about proxy voting. “I don’t put it past anybody in leadership to make sure they have the votes to get their agenda passed.” CORONAVIRUS: WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW Republicans signaled they believed that targeting Pelosi could help them win back the House. When Pelosi authorized the creation of a select committee on the coronavirus, House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy, R-Calif., denounced it for lacking equal representation by both Democrats and Republicans. However, Republicans, then in the majority, didn’t permit an equal number of Democrats to serve on the Select Benghazi Committee. A McCarthy spokesperson characterized the coronavirus panel as “impeachment 2.0.” Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, argued that the new panel was designed to boost the Democrats’ presumptive presidential nominee, Joe Biden. That’s because the select committee chairman, House Majority Whip Jim Clyburn, D-S.C., salvaged Biden’s campaign in the South Carolina primary. Clyburn’s assistance propelled the former vice president ahead of the pack. Democrats had first planned to reconvene the House last week. Then, party leaders backtracked after getting health advice from the Office of the Attending Physician at the Capitol. Democrats also noted it wasn’t worth bringing lawmakers back if the next coronavirus bill wasn’t ready for the floor yet. House Minority Whip Steve Scalise, R-La., turned the Democrats’ decision around on them. “Speaker Pelosi and her House majority would rather draft bills in secret than lead our country’s reopening by showing that we can safely get back to work in Congress,” Scalise said. McConnell and McCarthy had ganged up on Pelosi in mid-April when the Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) exhausted its funding. McConnell argued Democrats should have approved an additional $251 billion on the spot. But, both Republican leaders took aim at the House speaker. “Even as the program is saving millions of American jobs, Speaker Pelosi has said she sees ‘no data as to why we need’ to keep funding it,” McConnell and McCarthy declared in a joint statement. CLICK HERE TO GET THE FOX NEWS APP Politicians must navigate a new paradigm this fall. The 2020 election could unfold amid a second spike in coronavirus predicted by many epidemiologists. Candidates likely will find themselves trying to reach a distracted, fragmented electorate. Americans may be more focused on staying healthy, finding work and homeschooling their kids in fifth-grade fractions than voting. Those on the ballot must compete with a lot of noise. And, when you’re running against the din, the best thing for politicians on both sides is to keep it simple. That would mean assailing those with whom voters are most familiar: McConnell and Pelosi.

2020-05-04 01:06:06 • Fox News • https://www.foxnews.com/politics/coronavirus-washington-trump-house-blame-game-pergram
Rating: 3.32
'Normal People' stars talk romance, intimacy, and this irresistible relationship

Hulu's Normal People dropped on Wednesday, and within hours viewers were moved by the quiet beauty and devastation in the main characters' relationship.  Marianne (Daisy Edgar-Jones) and Connell (Paul Mescal) can't seem to escape each other, nor do they want to, but they struggle to find the contentment that love promises to bring. Mashable spoke to Mescal and Edgar-Jones ahead of the show's premiere about what makes a relationship like this so intriguing and what it means to be soulmates — if that's even possible. Mashable: What attracted you to these characters? Were you were familiar with them from the book? Daisy Edgar-Jones (Marianne): I read the book, actually, after my first self tape and before my chemistry read. Just from the [scene] alone, I really loved the character. I thought she was really funny, and a bit odd, and I really was excited to learn more about her. And then the book is, it was just the most incredible experience reading it. I really fell in love with the whole story and how simple it was, and just how Marianne was sort of flawed in many ways, Paul Mescal (Connell): I think it's very hard not to be attracted to the character when you're reading in the context that you might be playing [him]. There's so many great scenes in the book that when I was reading it, I was imagining how fun they would be to play as an actor. A very attractive book, I think from an acting perspective. There must be some pressure coming in to portray a relationship where there are fans, there are readers who are familiar with it. And you need leads with convincing chemistry for a show like this. It'll just fall apart without that. Were you aware of that going in?  DEJ: Yeah, definitely. The whole of the story rests really a lot on Marianne and Connell's dynamic and it was really important to get that right. Paul and I were very lucky that that kind of was there pretty much from the start. We both had a very similar understanding of the way they interact and who those characters were with each other. And that meant that we had a very sort of easy rhythm. You can kind of see the difference, when both characters are on their own or with other people, it always feel a bit off kilter, which is really interesting. What do you think makes a good romantic duo? DEJ: Oh, that's a nice question. PM: Yeah, I don't think we've had that question. I think that they find each other intellectually stimulating, which I think is the base level. I think you can absolutely fancy someone on a physical level, but ultimately, if you are intrigued by their intellectual capacity, that's going to elevate the relationship and I think that's really very present in Normal People... If I have to pick one trait that I think is essential for that kind of relationship-based drama and relationships in general, [it] will be that. DEJ: Yeah. And I would say for some relationships in general, which I think Marianne and Connell really do on the whole, is they like bringing out the best in each other in a lot of ways. Marianne kind of encourages Connell to pursue his talent and writing, and Connell kind of allows Marianne to accept who she is and to feel that she's worthy of love. And I think even though they do miscommunicate, they sometimes aren't always the best, they on the whole bring a lot of good to each other, which I think is should be the sort of gold standard for most relationships. And the relationship, because we follow them for so many years, goes through a lot of different stages. To someone unfamiliar with the text, how would you describe the relationship between these two characters? DEJ: It's hard to put your finger on it. For me, the part of the novel that I really remember stuck out in my brain was — I think it's the final chapter... Marianne is thinking about what her school friends must be thinking when they see Marianne and Connell kiss on New Year's Eve at the end of the book, and what she thinks is the fact that it must be strange for them to see these two people who, for whatever reason, can't seem to leave each other alone.  I think that's kind of perfect for them because they have such a wonderful dynamic, and as Paul said, they are both intellectually very bright and able to talk about things on such a deep level. But on the other hand, even though they can communicate so intelligently about huge, massive subjects, they seem to not be able to even do the simpler stuff sometimes of just being honest about what they feel. I think that just two characters who just are fascinated with each other and, I guess soulmates is the only way I could really think about it. I'm so glad Daisy that you said soulmates, because I find it very fascinating in fiction, and obviously in real life too, that you don't always end up with your soulmate. And that some of those stories tend to be even more interesting. With television and books you have the opportunity to explore that relationship differently, to explore what would happen if they didn't get the timing right, or if they did get it right for a little bit.  DEJ: I think that's precisely it, and it's precisely because they're soulmates that the ending is as it is. They love each other so much that they're able to let each other go if it's for the best, if it means the bettering of each other. Marianne, she knows that the pain of loneliness will be like nothing compared to the pain of feeling unworthy. I think she loves Connell enough that she wants to give him goodness by giving him the gift of encouraging him to go to New York because that's not something he'd be able to make the move to do on his own. And I think that's what true love is, that you can love someone enough that you can sort of move past the painfulness to give them the best. PM: I also think that it's probably more true to life that ... to be able to actually end up with your soulmate is a rarity — even to find your soulmate, and I'm not even sure if I believe in that as a concept. But I think in the case of Marianne and Connell, I think they struggle to find somebody as well-suited to each other. Were certain scenes that really stood out to you, that you still remember now from production as particularly interesting or challenging... One thing that comes to mind, Paul, is your scene with your therapist. That's a really intense emotional one. PM: I think that what me and Daisy were really lucky with is that you could pick any one of those kind of big scenes where they're in [conversation], talking to each other. Both Connell and Marianne [together] and Connell and Marianne in isolation, and you'd be lucky if you get to play one of those scenes throughout a series or a film. There's normally one scene per episode that is gigantic or is like seven or eight pages long. The counselor scene was one that I really wanted to get right, because I think it's a beautiful depiction of somebody — beautiful is definitely not the right word to use, but I think it's an authentic insight into somebody suffering from depression.  Also, I think those big scenes between Connell and Marianne are real studies in the complexities of a relationship. It's so hard to pick one because there's so many of them, but I love the scene in episode 5 when they communicate very effectively and Connell apologizes for not inviting Marianne to the debs. It's funny, I think that's one of Lenny's favorite scenes as well, because I remember in the shooting process that day was just gorgeous, like we had really lovely rehearsal of that scene and mine and Daisy's input was — you definitely feel it in the scene and it's just really nice to see that on screen. DEJ: I think challenging-wise I definitely found all the scenes when Marianne... isn't with Connell quite challenging. Because Paul and I had such a shorthand, really, by the end of the process of doing scenes together, I think I found it very difficult when the characters were apart and and in a dark place to kind of to play that. I guess particularly in Sweden when Marianne makes certain choices, it's a tricky thing to access.  As Paul said, there were so many big scenes that I guess are flags when you read the book, that really stand out in your mind. Doing them always felt strange when he stepped on set because it was like stepping inside the book and thinking "Oh, gosh, okay, hope we can do it as well as as the book does it." So certainly stuff like that I always find a bit daunting. The show does a really good job with with the sex, with the scenes of physical intimacy. It's simultaneously very sexy and very just lovely. I was curious how that was emphasized throughout the script and production because that's a really difficult thing to get right. DEJ: They so wonderfully written in the in the book, and it was really important to do them justice in the series, because I think what's great about them is they're never kind of for the sake of it. They're always carrying on a certain narrative or a story beat that's really important to those two characters. So I'm really glad that they come across the way we we wanted them to and Paul and I were very lucky that when we filmed them we had a brilliant intimacy coordinator on set who was in charge of the heavy lifting when it came to choreography and stuff like that, which meant we only ever had to worry about what exactly we were communicating acting-wise. We were very lucky to have that kind of safe environment to do so. PM: Yeah, totally. I can't imagine doing those scenes without an intimacy coordinator because I think, ultimately, we just wouldn't do as good a job because we'd be way too self-conscious. The power of having an intimacy coordinator is that it's somebody whose job is to is to specialize in making those scenes feel as authentic and as real as possible, while still empowering both myself and Daisy to feel creatively engaged but also incredibly safe. I would just implore any production company both for the benefit of their own TV show or film, to employ intimacy coordinators, and I think, to be honest, in the next few years, it'll become a necessity rather than a choice. Normal People is now streaming on Hulu.

2020-05-02 15:00:00 • Mashable • https://mashable.com/article/normal-people-paul-daisy-interview/?europe=true&utm_source=feedburner&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+Mashable+%28Mashable%29
Rating: 2.28
Entertainment
Rishi Kapoor's Leaked Video From ICU Enrages Bollywood Stars Arjun Kapoor, Mini Mathur And Others

2020-05-02 14:23:51 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.62
Importance: 1.62
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-02 11:13:14

Rishi Kapoor's Leaked Video From ICU Enrages Bollywood Stars Arjun Kapoor, Mini Mathur And Others

A video of late Rishi Kapoor, during his last hours from the ICU, was leaked online earlier today. Many Bollywood celebrities took to their social media handles, urging people not to share it if they come across the video. Reportedly, the video shows an intensive care unit staff sneakily recording the actor's struggles. Rishi Kapoor के leak हुए अंतिम क्षणों पर अस्पताल को भेजा गया Legal Notice | FilmiBeat Many celebs bashed the video and the people who are sharing it. Arjun Kapoor without mentioning about the video wrote, "The choice is not to post something is sometimes as important as to be the first to post something. Images have a lot of power lest we forget. Sometimes humanity and empathy must prevail over being first to embrace use of sly voyeuristic material presented to you." Actor Karan Wahi said he too came across the video and decided to delete it immediately as he found it disturbing. A report in TOI read Karan as saying, "There's a forward that a ward boy or someone from the hospital has shot of Rishi Kapoor in his hospital just before he passed. I saw it. And think it's a gross violation of his privacy. If you receive it, delete it rather than forward it further." He added: "Actors are also human beings. Please do not forward or post them just to be the first one. Have some respect." Mini Mathur took to her twitter page earlier today and urged fans to "stop the insensitivity". In a thread she wrote, "Just came across a disgusting, completely invasive video of Rishi sir on WhatsApp in hospital actually titled "last video of RK" obviously shot by a hospital staff member.I know humanity is at sea at the moment but can we PLEASE STOP THIS INSENSITIVITY and not be party to this?" She later also asked Mumbai Police to find the offender, "If you see a video like this on any group can you please insist that it's taken down??? Can we stop this vicarious celeb goggling even when they are indisposed and unaware? It should be a legal offence @MumbaiPolice and met with the strictest action," On Thursday, only a few hours after his passing, another video of Rishi Kapoor from the hospital had gone viral. The video showed a man singing Rishi Kapoor's hit song Tere dard se dil aabaad raha from Deewana, while standing besides the late actor. Many netizens claimed the video was from the time when the actor was receiving cancer treatment in New York, and not recent. Rishi Kapoor breathed his last at HN Reliance Hospital in Mumbai on Thursday, April 30, 2020, after battling cancer for two years. RIP Rishi Kapoor: Lesser Known Facts Out Bollywood's Beloved Chintu Ji 5 Most Interesting Tweets From Rishi Kapoor's Twitter Timeline

2020-05-02 14:23:51 • https://www.filmibeat.com • https://www.filmibeat.com/bollywood/news/2020/rishi-kapoor-s-leaked-video-from-icu-enrages-bollywood-stars-arjun-kapoor-mini-mathur-and-other-298373.html
Rating: 0.30
Leaked Rishi Kapoor video from ICU enrages Bollywood

A leaked video of late actor Rishi Kapoor during his last hours in the ICU has enraged many Bollywood celebrities. In the video, ICU staff can be seen sneakily recording as the veteran actor struggles. Several celebrities including Arjun Kapoor, Karan Wahi and Mini Mathur called out the hospital for staff negligence. Without mentioning the particular leaked video, Arjun wrote: “The choice is not to post something is sometimes as important as to be the first to post something. Images have a lot of power lest we forget. Sometimes humanity and empathy must prevail over being first to embrace use of sly voyeuristic material presented to you.” Actor Wahi admitted that he too saw the video and decided to delete it immediately, rather than share it among others as he found it disturbing. Wahi said: “There’s a forward that a ward boy or someone from the hospital has shot of Rishi Kapoor in his hospital just before he passed. I saw it. And think it’s a gross violation of his privacy. If you receive it, delete it rather than forward it further.” He added: “Actors are also human beings. Please do not forward or post them just to be the first one. Have some respect.” Mathur urged people to “stop the insensitivity”. She tweeted: “Just came across a disgusting, completely invasive video of Rishi sir on WhatsApp in hospital actually titled ‘last video of RK’ obviously shot by a hospital staff member. I know humanity is at sea at the moment but can we PLEASE STOP THIS INSENSITIVITY and not be party to Mathur?” Mini also tagged Mumbai Police to take strict actions against the offender. “If you see a video like this on any group can you please insist that it’s taken down??? Can we stop this vicarious celeb goggling even when they are indisposed and unaware? It should be a legal offence @MumbaiPolice and met with the strictest action,” Mini added. Rishi died at HN Reliance Hospital in Mumbai on Thursday. He had been battling cancer since 2018.

2020-05-02 11:13:14 • Gulf News • https://gulfnews.com/entertainment/hollywood/leaked-rishi-kapoor-video-from-icu-enrages-bollywood-1.71290731

Chris Evans makes Instagram debut to join 'All In Challenge' for COVID-19 relief

2020-05-02 14:33:00 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.62
Importance: 1.62
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-02 09:05:49

Chris Evans makes Instagram debut to join 'All In Challenge' for COVID-19 relief

WASHINGTON: American actor Chris Evans has finally joined Instagram. According to Fox News, the 38-year-old actor created a profile on May 1, and posted his first video for a good cause. The 'Knives Out' star joined the 'All In Challenge' after being called on by fellow Marvel star Chris Pratt. The actor is offering up a virtual hangout and game night with himself and five of his superhero friends. The site reads, "You and two friends are invited to a virtual game night with Chris Evans. Other attendees on the list, joining the virtual hangout are Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Scarlett Johansson, Mark Ruffalo and Jeremy Renner." Evans then challenged actors Sebastian Stan, Anthony Mackie, and Billy Porter. So far, the 'Gifted' star's profile has garnered 882k followers. Currently, the 'The Avengers' star is starring in Apple TV+'s new crime drama series 'Defending Jacob.' 

2020-05-02 14:33:00 • The New Indian Express • https://www.newindianexpress.com/entertainment/english/2020/may/02/chris-evans-makes-instagram-debut-to-join-all-in-challenge-for-covid-19-relief-2138224.html
Rating: 2.04
Chris Evans makes Instagram debut to join 'All In Challenge' for COVID-19 relief

American actor Chris Evans has finally joined Instagram. According to Fox News, the 38-year-old actor created a profile on May 1, and posted his first video for a good cause. The 'Knives Out' star joined the 'All In Challenge' after being called on by fellow Marvel star Chris Pratt. The actor is offering up a virtual hangout and game night with himself and five of his superhero friends. The site reads, "You and two friends are invited to a virtual game night with Chris Evans. Other attendees on the list, joining the virtual hangout are Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Scarlett Johansson, Mark Ruffalo and Jeremy Renner." Evans then challenged actors Sebastian Stan, Anthony Mackie, and Billy Porter. So far, the 'Gifted' star's profile has garnered 882k followers. Currently, the 'The Avengers' star is starring in Apple TV+'s new crime drama series 'Defending Jacob.'

2020-05-02 09:05:49 • Gulf News • https://gulfnews.com/entertainment/hollywood/chris-evans-makes-instagram-debut-to-join-all-in-challenge-for-covid-19-relief-1.1588399645382

Phillip Schofield's extreme new style after moving out of marital home and into bachelor flat

2020-05-02 11:38:21 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-02 11:38:21

Phillip Schofield's extreme new style after moving out of marital home and into bachelor flat

Phillip Schofield has taken to Instagram to show off his wildly different lockdown hair choices. In one picture he showed off slick back and styled hairdoo, while in another his silver hair was sticking up and unkempt. The TV personality wore a smart polo shirt in the black and white pic of his slick look while in the other he grimaced as his mop spiked in all directions. And fans of the presenter who wrote with his snap: "Lockdown hair options" had mixed opinions about his wacky hair styles. One wrote: "The second wild look!!." Another said: "Silver fox, followed by two flame emojis." A fan wrote: "Wow Phillip! Rocking them hair styles." Another added: "I like the nutty professor look!" While other fans were not as impressed with Phillip's lockdown hair choices. One wrote: "Cut it all offfffffff." Another said: "How many likes on this comment for you to shave it all off." The This Morning host also posted his smart hair style on his Instagram stories, captioning it: "If ya can't cut it, slick it." Philtook to his Instagram earlier this week to share the same snap of is unkempt hair. In the pic Phil appeared to be sitting in a balcony area on on a plush grey sofa in his new place. The pic was taken from his new bachelor pad where he moved to after moving out of the home he shared with his wife Steph when he came out as gay earlier this year. Phillip admitted that he 'misses hugs' after moving out of the £2million family home on Monday's episode of This Morning. He also this week opened up on how This Morning going ahead amid the coronavirus lockdown allowed him to keep positive mentally. He said: "It's very good for the head isn't it. I think this has saved my head actually, being able to come in here and keep going." Later on in the show, Phillip shared important advice as he encouraged one tearful viewer to remain positive during the unusual situation of lockdown. He said: "You've got to think positive, it's a time where we are all trying to find a silver lining in what is a very dark cloud... we will all get through this."=

2020-05-02 11:38:21 • mirror • https://www.mirror.co.uk/3am/celebrity-news/phillip-schofields-extreme-new-style-21961874

Victoria Beckham shares unseen footage to celebrate David's 45th birthday

2020-05-02 12:55:45 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-02 12:55:45

Victoria Beckham shares unseen footage to celebrate David's 45th birthday

Victoria Beckham has shared a heartwarming video montage to celebrate her husband David's 45th birthday today. The fashion designer, 46, shared the clip this morning showing nostalgic unseen videos and pictures, and had The Doobie Brothers hit Long Train Runnin' playing in the background. A clip also shows son Brooklyn, 21, surprising his dad for his 43rd birthday. She also shared a snap in a separate post of the pair walking Rottweilers Snoop and Puffy in Manchester 23 years ago. The former Spice Girl Victoria captioned her post: "Happy birthday @DavidBeckhamx Remembering our walks with Snoop and Puffy in Manchester all those years ago." David was also seen in a video with his family walking through Disneyland Florida wearing Mickey Mouse ears on over his black baseball cap. Cruz and Romeo were also shown playing guitars when they were children. Another snap shows the Beckham family sat on the front row at one of her fashion shows. The family were also seen in a throwback pic when they were at the Grand Canyon in the US. She captioned her sweet montage: "Happy bday to the best daddy. Celebrating in lockdown and missing @brooklynbeckham and all our friends and family today. We all love you so much xxx', she captioned the post." Many fans rushed to the comments section to send David well wishes. One wrote: "Many happy returns to the most wonderful David!" Victoria also shared a picture of a bacon and egg sandwich on her Instagram stories with "love" written in tomato ketchup, which was captioned "happy birthday David Beckham". This week Victoria reversed her decision to furlough 30 employees at her fashion company after coming under immense criticism. The entrepreneur, who has a combined fortune of £335 million with husband David, opted to use the government bail out scheme and use tax-payers' money to pay 80% of her staff's wages while they are at home. However, Posh has now undergone a change of heart after being 'devastated' by the public reaction. Her fashion brand had earlier sent letters to staff warning them that they were going to be furloughed under the Government's scheme for two months.

2020-05-02 12:55:45 • mirror • https://www.mirror.co.uk/3am/celebrity-news/victoria-beckham-shares-unseen-footage-21962072
Rating: 2.39
Victoria Beckham shares unseen footage to celebrate David's 45th birthday

Victoria Beckham has shared a heartwarming video montage to celebrate her husband David's 45th birthday today. Entertainment
Nicola Mclean dishes the dirt on hellish stars during I'm a Celeb stint

2020-05-02 15:51:54 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-02 15:51:54

Nicola Mclean dishes the dirt on hellish stars during I'm a Celeb stint

Nicola Mclean has told how former I'm A Celeb 2008 camp mate David Van Day wound her up on the show and was an "absolute t***". The former glamour model, 38, invited fans to take part in a Q & A session on her Instagram stories. When asked who was her most favourite and least contestant on the eighth series of the show Nicola told how former 80s pop star, 63, infuriated her. She said: "My least favourite was David Van Day because he was an absolute t***. Literally his sole purpose was to p*** everyone off. it worked good for him but oh my god it was hell to live with." David Van Day has been approached by Mirror Online for comment. Nicola invited her fans to ask her questions to 'give her some entertainment during self-isolation'. She said: "Entertain me guys, ask me some advice, tell me some outrageous stories, ask me a question, anything you want." When one fan asked how is she coping with lockdown, Nicola said 'she was doing alright now, but took her a while to get used to it'. Another fan asked if she would ever get a bum job? Nicola replied: "No I hate them, I hate big bums I want to look straight up and down with big boobs." Nicola claimed in November 2017 that David, who rose to fame in the duo Dollar, made sexual advances towards her on camera. Responding to the comments, David Van Day's wife, Sue Moxley, told MailOnline : "This was all a bit of harmless fun for TV. It was before I met David nine years ago. I don't know why this is being brought up now. She hasn't been in the press much recently. "I though Nicola and I were friends. It would have been nice if she gave me the heads up. We've actually all posed together as a group at a red carpet event since the programme aired and everything was fine and friendly." Nicola is married to footballer Tom Williams, and the couple have two sons, Rocky and Striker. Nicola finished sixth I'm A Celebrity... and also appeared in CelebrityBig Brother

2020-05-02 15:51:54 • mirror • https://www.mirror.co.uk/3am/celebrity-news/nicola-mclean-dishes-dirt-hellish-21962698
Rating: 2.39

Entertainment
Cyntoia Brown love story: Marriage and children plans after 15 years in prison

2020-05-02 16:46:55 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-02 16:46:55

Cyntoia Brown love story: Marriage and children plans after 15 years in prison

Cyntoia Brown's nightmare battle for justice has gone global - with a hit Netflix documentary, star backing and follow on book on the way. But after the Netflix cameras stopped rolling the now justice campaigner Cyntoia, 32, had to begin paving a new life for herself post release with a husband, plans for children and a potential law career. In fact, even before Cyntoia had left prison she married rapper Jamie Long - who inspired her to believe she would eventually become a free woman. Long said he first discovered Cyntoia and her plight on a 2011 YouTube video, saying he felt compelled to watch her: "I felt God tell me, stop and write her. I told her basically, 'God told me to tell you you're getting out of prison'." He sent the letter in 2017 and even burnt the edges to make it stand out from her other fan mail. "There was just something about him," Cyntoia said and four months latert they met face t o face. "When I went in to see her, I knew right then she would be my wife. I bought my wife's wedding ring while she was still in prison, and we didn't know if she was getting out," he said, recalling their romance. They got engaged two years later and married before she was released in 2019. They plan on starting a family, with her husband saying: "I want to settle down and start a family. I want to live for you and please you. This time I got it right, and I know I got it right." Since her release, Brown-Long has gone on a national speaking tour and is thinking about law school. Cyntonia was released on August 7 last year after her life sentence was commuted to 15 years. She admitted killing Johnny Michael after he solicited her for sex - he was aged 43, she was a very young looking 16. Since her conviction both Tennessee and American law changed significantly over the sentencing of minors for serious crimes and millions protested about the length of jail time for Cyntoia, an at-risk-child at the mercy of a series of a predatory men.

2020-05-02 16:46:55 • mirror • https://www.mirror.co.uk/3am/celebrity-news/cyntoia-brown-love-story-marriage-21962336
Rating: 2.39
Cyntoia Brown love story: Marriage and children plans after 15 years in prison

Cyntoia Brown's nightmare battle for justice has gone global - with a hit Netflix documentary, star backing and follow on book on the way. But after the Netflix cameras stopped rolling the now justice campaigner Cyntoia, 32, had to begin paving a new life for herself post release with a husband, plans for children and a potential law career. In fact, even before Cyntoia had left prison she married rapper Jamie Long - who inspired her to believe she would eventually become a free woman. Long said he first discovered Cyntoia and her plight on a 2011 YouTube video, saying he felt compelled to watch her: "I felt God tell me, stop and write her. I told her basically, 'God told me to tell you you're getting out of prison'." He sent the letter in 2017 and even burnt the edges to make it stand out from her other fan mail. "There was just something about him," Cyntoia said and four months latert they met face t o face. "When I went in to see her, I knew right then she would be my wife. I bought my wife's wedding ring while she was still in prison, and we didn't know if she was getting out," he said, recalling their romance. They got engaged two years later and married before she was released in 2019. They plan on starting a family, with her husband saying: "I want to settle down and start a family. I want to live for you and please you. This time I got it right, and I know I got it right." Since her release, Brown-Long has gone on a national speaking tour and is thinking about law school. Cyntonia was released on August 7 last year after her life sentence was commuted to 15 years. She admitted killing Johnny Michael after he solicited her for sex - he was aged 43, she was a very young looking 16. Since her conviction both Tennessee and American law changed significantly over the sentencing of minors for serious crimes and millions protested about the length of jail time for Cyntoia, an at-risk-child at the mercy of a series of a predatory men.

2020-05-02 16:46:55 • Irish Mirror • https://www.irishmirror.ie/showbiz/celebrity-news/cyntoia-brown-love-story-marriage-21963095
Rating: 0.56
Entertainment
David Walliams brands Jamie Redknapp's gorgeous mum Sandra, 74, a 'Hot Mama'

2020-05-02 19:30:23 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-02 19:30:23

David Walliams brands Jamie Redknapp's gorgeous mum Sandra, 74, a 'Hot Mama'

TV funnyman David Walliams has branded Jamie Redknapp's mum a 'hot mama'. The Britain's Got Talent Judge, 48, was left mighty impressed when footballer Jamie, 46, took to social media to share a tribute to his 74-year-old mother on her birthday. Taking to Instagram, Jamie shared images of his toned mum Sandra posing in swimwear and showing off her classic good looks with her high cheekbones. Clearly ageing like a fine wine, svelte Sandra looks incredible in the photos. Jamie captioned the post: "Happy birthday to this incredible lady. We adore you mum. Thanks for your wisdom, love and care." The former husband of Louise Redknapp, with whom he shares two sons, also spoke about being separated from his mother during the lockdown procedures enforced by the government as a result of the coronavirus pandemic. "You have been a rock throughout my life, given me support that I hope I can give my kids throughout their lives too. I miss you and I can’t wait to see you. "No doubt you will be waiting on dad hand and foot today! "But make sure he looks after you. See you soon when this is over and love you always. Your boy Jamie." Many of Jamie's followers were loving the pics, but none more so than Mr Little Britain himself, David Walliams. David commented on the post: "Hot Mama." Jamie wasn't the only one who was sharing a tribute to Sandra, as it was also his father and her husband, football legend Harry Redknapp. "Happy birthday Sandra I love you more now than the day I met you if that’s possible," wrote Harry on his Instagram account. The couple first met in 1963 on the dancefloor of an East London pub when Sandra was 17. Harry noted when appearing on I'm a Celebrity Get Me Out of Here!: "We were only just 17 when we started going out, and we’ve never been apart since. I love her like mad – she’s my life." He later went on to win the 2018 series of the show and was crowned King of the Jungle. Do you have a story to sell? Get in touch with us at webcelebs@trinitymirror.com or call us direct 0207 29 33033.

2020-05-02 19:30:23 • mirror • https://www.mirror.co.uk/3am/celebrity-news/david-walliams-brands-jamie-redknapps-21963310

Entertainment
Love Island's Curtis Pritchard poses completely naked as he does gardening in the buff

2020-05-03 00:50:03 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-03 00:50:03

Love Island's Curtis Pritchard poses completely naked as he does gardening in the buff

Curtis Pritchard has been showing a very different side to himself during lockdown. The former Love Island star, 24, took to Instagram to post a picture of himself completely naked on Saturday. He decided to strip off to honour Naked Gardening Day 2020 and could be seen wearing a pair of gloves and holding a gardening fork. In the saucy snap he had his back to the camera and flashed his bare bum as he held up the fork in the air. He was wearing nothing but a pair of black boots and socks as he posed in his driveway. "HAPPY INTERNATIONAL NAKED GARDENING DAY!" Curtis captioned the post. His 1.5million Instagram followers were left in stitches by the cheeky snap. One commented: "You're welcome to come and do my garden any time." "Only you Curtis!!!! Love it x," another posted. A third wrote: "I'm in urgent need of a gardener." "You can be my gardener any day," a fourth said. Another posted: "Well that's cheered my Saturday up no end!" It comes after reports that Curtis' TV show The Greatest Dancer has been axed. The decision comes comes after producers pulled out all the stops with an all star cast for the 2020 series and big name performers that sadly failed to pull in viewers. A source told The Sun: "Now the BBC and everyone involved has decided enough is enough and they've binned it. "Critics liked it and it pulled in a younger audience. But the cost of the big production for the ratings the show delivered was too much."

2020-05-03 00:50:03 • mirror • https://www.mirror.co.uk/3am/celebrity-news/love-islands-curtis-pritchard-poses-21965124

Entertainment
Kylie Jenner names daughter Stormi her greatest achievement with adorable poolside snap

2020-05-03 00:54:42 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-03 00:54:42

Kylie Jenner names daughter Stormi her greatest achievement with adorable poolside snap

Billionaire Kylie Jenner has named what she considers he greatest achievement - her daughter Stormi. The reality star and makeup mogul shares the two year old with ex and rapper Travis Scott, and paid tribute to her beautiful girl with a cute snap by the pool. Stormi has a mischievous grin on her face as doting mum Kylie wraps a towel about her head to dry her curls. "The greatest thing I've ever done," Kylie captioned the snap. Pals and fans alike were quick to gush over the iconic mother-daughter duo. Malika Haqq, the best mate of Kylie's sister Khloe Kardashian and fellow mum, wrote: "Stop the cuteness!" Kylie's bestie Anastasia Karanikolaou commented: "sweeeeeeetest baby girl." Yris Palmer, meanwhile, just shared a string of heart emojis. Kylie's had a hell of a year already, not least because she was named by Forbes, at the age of 22, as the world's youngest billionaire for the second year running. She's had fans tongue-wagging recently with a declaration of love for Stormi's dad Travis - the pair aren't together, but a loving Instagram post for his birthday has some hopeful that a reunion might be on the cards. "DADA," she wrote, "Happy birthday to daddy of the year! "I'm slowly but surely starting to accept the fact that Storm is a daddy's girl. But whatever. We went half on greatness! "The most beautiful, smart, funny and loving little baby. The best gift. "OK I'm crying. Love you forever! @travisscott." The pair announced they would be taking a break from their relationship late last year - and while no romantic rekindling has been confirmed, they've successfully co-parented Stormi.

2020-05-03 00:54:42 • mirror • https://www.mirror.co.uk/3am/celebrity-news/kylie-jenner-names-daughter-stormi-21965140

Entertainment
BGT fans in disbelief over hopeful's real age as she performs with young daughter

2020-05-03 00:56:02 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-03 00:56:02

BGT fans in disbelief over hopeful's real age as she performs with young daughter

Britain’s Got Talent 2020 viewers were left sharing their disbelief over one hopeful's age on Saturday night, as she took to the stage with her young daughter. Singing duo Honey and Sammy wowed the judges and fans with their moving rendition of Freya Ridings’ Lost Without You. They went on to win Amanda Holden’s Golden Buzzer in emotional scenes, with the judge in tears. But before they’d even started singing, viewers watching at home were stunned over something mum Sammy said. Asked by Simon Cowell for her age, after confirming her daughter was 14, Sammy revealed that she was 43 years old. Stunning Sammy’s youthful looks left viewers in shock though, with many believing she was much younger. Taking to twitter, they couldn't believe her real age and some even thought the girls were sisters. One fan commented: "Bloody hell is that really her mum." Another said: "43? she looks fantastic #BGT #BritainsGotTalent." A third tweeted: "Omg they look like sisters!!" The pair were stopped mid performance by Simon Cowell, with him asking for a different song. A little later the mother and daughter returned, and left the judges speechless with their audition. Amanda was moved to tears and praised the pair, before hitting her Golden Buzzer. Sammy and Honey burst into tears, as Amanda joined them on stage. Britain's Got Talent continues Saturdays at 8pm on ITV.

2020-05-03 00:56:02 • mirror • https://www.mirror.co.uk/tv/tv-news/bgt-fans-disbelief-over-hopefuls-21964646

Entertainment
Mystery over Rob Kardashian and stunning British influencer Kenza Boutrif's new friendship

2020-05-03 16:56:03 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-03 16:56:03

Mystery over Rob Kardashian and stunning British influencer Kenza Boutrif's new friendship

Rob Kardashian has just added stunning British model and influencer Kenza Boutrif to his Instagram following, taking the total up to 21. The 33-year-old reality star set tongues wagging on social media after giving the UK-based model and social media star a follow over the weekend. Rob's tiny following is usually reserved for his closest family and friends, such as his sisters Kourtney, Khloe and Kim Kardashian. The reality star's unusual move came less than a week after he made a rare appearance on Keeping Up With The Kardashians to celebrate his daughter's birthday. But what do we know about Rob's new social media friend? Kenza Boutrif is a glamorous social media model that is represented by Wilhelmina Models. She boasts an impressive following of 634,000 fans on Instagram and only follows 103 back - including Rob. The well-travelled influencer boasts pictures taken in Dubai, New York and Los Angeles among her incredible collection of jet setting snaps and she was also at London Fashion Week earlier this year. Among her stellar collection of pictures, she has also received plenty of approval from other popular UK reality stars. Some of her pictures have been liked by Love Island stars Belle Hassan and Yewande Biala. Kenza also has her own Depop page where she is selling plenty of designer goods such as Comme Des Garcons and a pair of Alexander McQueen trainers. In the meantime, Rob is currently embroiled in a bitter fued with his ex-girlfriend and model Blac Chynna. The former couple dated back in 2016 and their daughter was born just one month before their split was made official. Since then, the volatile couple have been caught up in an ongoing and complicated custody battle over their Dream. At the end of February 2020, a judge denied Rob's request to have primary custody over his daughter. Both Rob and Kenza have been contacted for comment. Do you have a story to sell ? Get in touch with us at webcelebs@trinitymirror.com or call us direct 0207 29 3303

Rating: 0.56
Entertainment
Gogglebox viewers rank the stars with one group taking nearly 40% of the vote

2020-05-03 18:05:05 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-03 18:05:05

Gogglebox viewers rank the stars with one group taking nearly 40% of the vote

Gogglebox has become beloved by millions, and everyone has their favourites. Fans recently took part in a poll that allowed them to put forward which of the 11 groups they reckoned deserved the honour of the top spot. The poll, conducted by The Liverpool Echo, asked fans to order the stars based on how much they make them laugh - with one even stealing 39% of the vote. Below are all 11 groups, ranked... London family the Vens joined the show quite late, during season 11 in 2018. Marcus, girlfriend Mica, and her two daughters Sachelle and Shuggy have become renowned for their bubbly personalities, fits of laughter, and on point honesty. Mica provided a priceless fan favourite moment as they sat down to watch Victoria Coren Mitchell's notoriously tricky Only Connect, laughing: "This show isn't for the hood, man." Dad Andrew, mum Carolyne and son Louis have been Gogglebox fixtures since the show first kicked off. Their numbers have fluctuated, as twin sisters Alex and Catheryne seem to come and go as well. The family have become best known for Andrew's uncompromising and often scathing wit, as he kicks back in that enormous armchair. Brighton hairdresser Stephen first appeared on the show alongside then boyfriend Chris, before the pair went their separate ways. He's since been joined by husband Daniel, as well as mum Pat for a stint. Stephen is responsible for one of the most iconic Gogglebox moments. As he and Chris watched the news, the latter observed: "We all like a bad boy, don't we?" A stunned Stephen looks around and answers: "Not a f**king terrorist though, Chris!" Dave and Shirley have been married for a staggering 40 years, filming the show from their home in Wales. Joining the show in 2015, fans have learned that the pair have a genuine deep love for each other - but that won't stop them having a bicker now and again. Ellie and Izzi stirred the pot recently when they made their feelings very clear about Boris Johnson. Still, the Yorkshire sisters are mostly a light hearted pair, most often obsessing over food. When they first put their names down for the show, they reckoned people wouldn't be interested in what they had to say. The poll begs to differ... Bristol besties Mary and Marina are completely unfiltered and they hold nothing back. Both in their 80s, they film from a retirement home and have won legions of fans as their conversations go off on tangents. Dad Sid and sons Baasit and Umar are well known for their no nonsense slams and quick wit. The core three are often joined by other family members, like sister Raza and their mum. The family of four have carved out a place as firm fan favourites, as have their Rottweilers. The dogs can be seen having a nose about the place and often trying to swipe a biscuit or two when they think the family won't notice. In fact, their snack collection has become the stuff of Gogglebox legend, with fans not convinced they ever eat them themselves. Probably the quirkiest couple on the list, Giles and Mary will always have a place in fans' hearts. The posh duo's home is instantly memorable, as are their lengthy and eloquent rants about whatever they're watching. Coming in second place with 23% of the vote, brother and sister Pete and Sophie were string contenders for the top spot despite only arriving on the show in 2018. The Blackpool pair have become renowned for mocking each other as much as they do the telly, so it's no surprise they've proved a hit with fans. Taking the top spot are the iconic, the legendary, the one and only Jenny and Lee. The caravan-based pair from Hull swept up a whopping 39% of the vote, landing them as the firm victors. They first met when Jenny was a landlady and Lee was a pub regular, and have since struck up the sweetest - and funniest friendship. Joining in 2014, it's not difficult to see why they've managed to place themselves at the top of the list.

2020-05-03 18:05:05 • mirror • https://www.mirror.co.uk/tv/tv-news/gogglebox-viewers-rank-stars-one-21967130
Rating: 2.39

Joining in 2014, it's not difficult to see why they've managed to place themselves at the top of the list.

2020-05-03 18:05:05 • Irish Mirror • https://www.irishmirror.ie/tv/gogglebox-viewers-rank-stars-one-21967183
Rating: 0.56
Entertainment
The Apprentice star Lottie Lion apologises after Lord Sugar 'racist' comments

2020-05-03 18:58:44 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-03 18:58:44

The Apprentice star Lottie Lion apologises after Lord Sugar 'racist' comments

The Apprentice has had its fair share of big personalities, but you'd be hard pressed to find one who could outmatch the controversial Lottie Lion. Lottie, who's only 20 years old, made her mark among last year's contenders and had accusations of racism levelled against her. Now she's found herself in hot water again after her impression of Venezuelan born team mate Jemelin Artigas stoked some considerable backlash. Jemelin, who's clashed with Lottie before, shared a video sent to her on her own Twitter, in which Lottie and contestant Ryan-Mark Parson take part in an Instagram Live. Lottie mocks Jemelin's accent while Ryan-Mark laughs along. She added, in her own voice: "It's like, darling, we all started from nothing - I started from nothing." Lottie went on to say: "If we're going to talk about f**king racists, let's talk about Lord Sugar! "He's an actual racist!" Mirror Online have gone to Lord Sugar's rep for comment. Lottie and Ryan-Mark have since apologised over her impersonation, telling MailOnline : "We impersonated various candidates from The Apprentice on our Instagram Live on Friday. "We are aware one candidate has taken offence and can only apologise." On social media she had previously defended her comments as "light entertainment" rather than anything meant to hurt. "Doing these impressions of The Apprentice candidates last night was meant to be some light entertainment for my fans during these difficult times ," she tweeted. "I am aware that an individual HAS taken offence, and I can only apologise." Nor has Jemelin been silent on the matter, sharing a string of tweets explaining her position. She branded Lottie "the biggest racist" and accused the pair of being "pathetic" after Lottie issued her apology tweet. However, she retweeted Ryan-Mark's apology and wrote: "I will always appreciate people taking responsibility so thank you @ryanmarkparsons and even though I know some not so nice things have been said. "I appreciate you apologising so thank you."

2020-05-03 18:58:44 • mirror • https://www.mirror.co.uk/3am/celebrity-news/apprentice-star-lottie-lion-apologises-21967335
Rating: 2.39
The Apprentice star Lottie Lion apologises after Lord Sugar 'racist' comments

The Apprentice has had its fair share of big personalities, but you'd be hard pressed to find one who could outmatch the controversial Lottie Lion. Lottie, who's only 20 years old, made her mark among last year's contenders and had accusations of racism levelled against her. Now she's found herself in hot water again after her impression of Venezuelan born team mate Jemelin Artigas stoked some considerable backlash. Jemelin, who's clashed with Lottie before, shared a video sent to her on her own Twitter, in which Lottie and contestant Ryan-Mark Parson take part in an Instagram Live. Lottie mocks Jemelin's accent while Ryan-Mark laughs along. She added, in her own voice: "It's like, darling, we all started from nothing - I started from nothing." Lottie went on to say: "If we're going to talk about f**king racists, let's talk about Lord Sugar! "He's an actual racist!" Lord Sugar's rep declined to comment when approached by Mirror Online. Lottie and Ryan-Mark have since apologised over her impersonation, telling MailOnline : "We impersonated various candidates from The Apprentice on our Instagram Live on Friday. "We are aware one candidate has taken offence and can only apologise." On social media she had previously defended her comments as "light entertainment" rather than anything meant to hurt. "Doing these impressions of The Apprentice candidates last night was meant to be some light entertainment for my fans during these difficult times ," she tweeted. "I am aware that an individual HAS taken offence, and I can only apologise." Nor has Jemelin been silent on the matter, sharing a string of tweets explaining her position. She branded Lottie "the biggest racist" and accused the pair of being "pathetic" after Lottie issued her apology tweet. However, she retweeted Ryan-Mark's apology and wrote: "I will always appreciate people taking responsibility so thank you @ryanmarkparsons and even though I know some not so nice things have been said. "I appreciate you apologising so thank you."

2020-05-03 18:58:44 • Irish Mirror • https://www.irishmirror.ie/showbiz/celebrity-news/apprentice-star-lottie-lion-apologises-21967353
Rating: 0.56

2020-05-03 20:25:51 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-03 20:25:51

Halle Berry strips off for naked shower selfie as she takes some self care time

Halle Berry stripped naked for her latest social media offering as she posed in a nude selfie. The actress, 53, told her 6.1 million followers that she was indulging in some self-care. She added that she's been using Taraji P Henson's products, paying tribute to her pal and urging fans to give her stuff a go. "I've known this woman since she started in the industry," Halle wrote, "And it's been such a joy to watch her flourish and succeed. "Obsessed with this line, check my stories for a few of my favourites!" The Hollywood icon recently reminisced about her time in the industry, including her work on Die Another Day, Pierce Brosnan's last Bond film before he hung up the mantle. Halle recalled that the Irish actor, now 66, had to give her the Heimlich Manoeuvre as she choked on a fig during a steamy sex scene. Chatting with American talk show host Jimmy Fallon from her home, she dished: "I was supposed to be all sexy, trying to seduce him with a fig, and then I ended up choking on it and he had to get up and do the Heimlich. "James Bond knows how to Heimlich! "He was there for me, he will always be one of my favourite people in the world." She was playing love interest and fellow spy Jinx, revealing that the studio had even flirted with the idea of giving her character her own spinoff flick. She's also been battling online trolls since going into lockdown, clapping back at those who passed judgement on her for letting six year old Maceo-Robert wear high heels. "Is this your daughter or your son?" one wrote. She came back: "Well it's a he and he is having a ball. Tryna cope the best he can! Laughter helps a lot right now."

2020-05-03 20:25:51 • mirror • https://www.mirror.co.uk/3am/celebrity-news/halle-berry-strips-naked-shower-21967655

Zayn Malik 'couldn't be more thrilled' Gigi Hadid is pregnant and 'always hoped' they'd reunite

2020-05-04 00:22:30 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-04 00:22:30

Zayn Malik 'couldn't be more thrilled' Gigi Hadid is pregnant and 'always hoped' they'd reunite

Zayn Malik and Gigi Hadid are expecting their first child, they've confirmed. And the former One Direction singer, 27, "couldn't be more thrilled" with the happy news, as it's claimed he always held out hope they'd get back together. The couple have been on and off since 2015 and rekindled their relationship in December, with the news of their pregnancy coming out this week. A source told US Weekly: "Zayn has always been so into Gigi and she's always been such a big part of his life. "Even when there were times that they weren’t a couple, the love was still very much there." The couple's relationship is now "solid" ahead of the baby's arrival, it's claimed. The source added: "He was very hopeful that they would get back together." Mirror Online has contacted Zayn's reps for comment. Gigi, 25, and Zayn are currently staying at the Hadid family farm in Pennsylvania amid the coronavuris lockdown. She is said to be twenty weeks along with the pregnancy. Gigi's mum Yolanda Hadid confirmed the news after the rumours first came out. "Still shocked our little secret got leaked to the press," she told told RTL Boulevard. "Of course we are so excited. I'm excited to become a oma [grandmother] in September especially after I lost my mom so recently. Gigi then confirmed the news herself in a video chat with US talk show host Jimmy Fallon. "We're very excited and happy and grateful for everyone's well wishes and support," she gushed.

2020-05-04 00:22:30 • mirror • https://www.mirror.co.uk/3am/celebrity-news/zayn-malik-couldnt-more-thrilled-21968336

Entertainment
The Chase fans in disbelief over contestant's likeness to Emmerdale legend

2020-05-04 00:30:03 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-04 00:30:03

The Chase fans in disbelief over contestant's likeness to Emmerdale legend

Viewers tuning into The Chase's family special on Sunday, called The Family Chase, were left stunned by one contestant. Those watching the ITV gameshow dubbed her a lookalike of a former Emmerdale legend. Viewers thought contestant Paula looked so much like the character in particular, that they began calling her by said character's name. Emmerdale fans were quick to spot she looked remarkably like Val Pollard. Val was married to Eric Pollard in the Dales, before her tragic death in 2015 during the helicopter stunt. She was played by actress Charlie Hardwick since 2004. As Paula appeared on The Chase on Sunday, fans spotted the huge resemblance between her and the actress who played Val. From the hair colour to the matching style, and even the Geordie accent, fans couldn't believe their eyes. One viewer said: "Seat 2  #TheChase," with an image of Val leading to many others agreeing. Another fan agreed: "Val up now! #TheChase." A third said: "Now it's Val from Emmerdale  #Thefamilychase." Unfortunately, like her sister who went before her, Paula was caught by the Chaser, Paul Sinha, and sent home. As her departure aired, one fan tweeted: "That was too f***ing easy. Now do one back to the Woolpack, Val." A second fan hoped she might return for the final chase, and said: "Go low & bring Val back oot!" Unfortunately, it was just Hannah left to play in the final round and she and the family did not win the cash prize. The Chase airs weeknights at 5pm on ITV.

2020-05-04 00:30:03 • mirror • https://www.mirror.co.uk/tv/tv-news/chase-fans-disbelief-over-contestants-21968182

Entertainment
Who will take Holly Willoughby's spot on Celebrity Juice?

2020-05-04 00:41:09 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.48
Importance: 1.48
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-04 00:41:09

Who will take Holly Willoughby's spot on Celebrity Juice?

Now that Holly Willoughby had opted to leave Celebrity Juice, the show needs a new team captain. With no official word on who will fill Holly's shoes, fans are busy speculating as to who will be baring the brunt of Keith Lemon's most outrageous gags. Holly did just that for 12 years, having been a team captain since the show got off the ground way back in 2008 - but who will take her place? The biggest theories are below... The Corrie and Our Girl star is probably the front runner right now. Both Michelle and hunky husband Mark Wright have made appearances on the show, and both were a hit with fans. Bookies Ladbrokes are backing her too, a spokesman saying: "Michelle Keegan's no stranger to Celebrity Juice and she could soon become a permanent fixture if the latest odds are anything to go by." She's also hung up her helmet on Our Girl, so she could have some space open in her diary... Gogglebox original Scarlett Moffatt has also been floated by fans. She's also appeared on the show, and proved a popular panellist. Ladbrokes reckon she's a solid bet, and fans know from Gogglebox she's got the comedy chops to stand her own ground. Inbetweeners star Emily went through a surge in popularity after her I'm A Celebrity stint in 2018. She's since become an ITV staple, with This Morning appearances and a hosting gig on I'm A Celebrity: Extra Camp. Emily's appeared fairly recently on Celebrity Juice, and sent Keith into overdrive by sharing a kiss with Spice Girl Mel B. Kelly and Keith must be close mates by now - she's turned up on the show, and even starred in his film, aptly named Keith Lemon: The Movie. She's already got her radio show so her diary's pretty busy, but if her recent Bake Off stint proved anything it's that she can keep fans entertained. Her rapport with pal Keith is already well established in fans' minds, so she won't take much introduction. The Italian chef is another ITV staple, and no stranger to speaking his mind. During his This Morning appearances, when he cooks with Holly and Phillip Schofield, he's become legendary for his brutal honesty and scathing criticism. He's been busy with Gordon Ramsay and Fred Sirieix on their show Gordon, Gino and Fred: Road Trip, so it's uncertain how much freedom he'll have. He'd certainly clash with Keith...

2020-05-04 00:41:09 • mirror • https://www.mirror.co.uk/tv/tv-news/who-take-holly-willoughbys-spot-21968307

Rishi Kapoor's ashes immersed in Banganga

2020-05-03 22:58:00 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.44
Importance: 1.44
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-03 21:16:00

Rishi Kapoor's ashes immersed in Banganga

MUMBAI: Veteran actor Rishi Kapoor's ashes were immersed in Banganga tank here on Sunday, his elder brother Randhir Kapoor said. Rishi Kapoor died at the age of 67 on April 30 at H N Reliance hospital in south Mumbai, after a two year long battle with leukaemia. Randhir Kapoor said a prayer meet for the actor was held on Saturday. "We did prayer meet yesterday. Today we immersed his ashes in Banganga as we haven't received permission from the authorities to go to Haridwar," Randhir Kapoor told PTI. ALSO READ: 7000 per cent rise in online search about Rishi Kapoor in India after his demise A picture has gone viral on social media, where Rishi Kapoor's actor-son Ranbir and wife Neetu are seen sitting next to his photograph. According to family sources, the actor's daughter Riddhima Kapoor Sahni, who was unable to attend the funeral as she was travelling from Delhi by road, was present at the prayer meet. "There were not many people, Only five-six family members," the insider said. Rishi Kapoor had returned to India last September after undergoing treatment for cancer in the US for almost a year. In February, he was hospitalised twice.

2020-05-03 22:58:00 • The New Indian Express • https://www.newindianexpress.com/entertainment/hindi/2020/may/03/rishi-kapoors-ashes-immersed-in-banganga-2138700.html
Rating: 2.04
Rishi Kapoor's ashes immersed in Banganga tank in South Mumbai

Veteran actor Rishi Kapoor's ashes were immersed in Banganga tank here on Sunday, his elder brother Randhir Kapoor said. Rishi Kapoor died at the age of 67 on April 30 at H N Reliance hospital in south Mumbai, after a two-year-long battle with leukaemia. Randhir Kapoor said a prayer meet for the actor was held on Saturday. "We did prayer meet yesterday. Today we immersed his ashes in Banganga as we haven't received permission from the authorities to go to Haridwar," Randhir Kapoor told PTI. A picture has gone viral on social media, where Rishi Kapoor's actor-son Ranbir and wife Neetu are seen sitting next to his photograph. For latest updates on coronavirus outbreak, click here According to family sources, the actor's daughter Riddhima Kapoor Sahni, who was unable to attend the funeral as she was travelling from Delhi by road, was present at the prayer meet. "There were not many people, Only five-six family members," the insider said. Rishi Kapoor had returned to India last September after undergoing treatment for cancer in the US for almost a year. In February, he was hospitalised twice.

2020-05-03 21:16:00 • Deccan Herald • https://www.deccanherald.com/entertainment/rishi-kapoors-ashes-immersed-in-banganga-tank-in-south-mumbai-833071.html
